hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /html/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors
php5.6 parse_unstructured_text_memoirs.php jenkins '{"resource_id": "91362_species", "resource_name":"all_BHL"}'
php5.6 process_SI_pdfs_memoirs.php jenkins '{"resource_id": "91362_species", "resource_name":"NAF", "doc": "BHL", "IOReport": "NAF_first7"}' #generates 91362_species.tar.gz OK
sleep 30 #wait for 60 seconds
php5.6 environments_2_eol.php jenkins '{"task": "generate_eol_tags_pensoft", "resource":"all_BHL", "resource_id":"91362_species", "subjects":"Description|Uses"}' #generates 91362_species_ENV.tar.gz OK
## combine two DwCA php5.6 aggregate_91362.php jenkins #generates 91362_resource.tar.gz OK
###orig continues to: ### z NorthAmericanFlora_7_documents
